Description

Mad Capacity is Justin Luk. LREVG is Chuck Bergeron. Together they've teamed up to bring quality 2D games to life.

History

Early History

Justin Luk & Chuck Bergeron met in Junior High school, over 20 years ago. In their youth, they loved getting together for gaming and couldn't put down the Atari, then NES, then SNES, then PlayStation, well, you get the idea.

Recent History

We have a confession to make. We watched Indie Game: The Movie and were inspired to start making games. Yes. We're those guys. Thankfully, we've been programming and designing various software creations for over 25 combined years, so we know how to create beautiful & memorable digital experiences.
